roleset.name: talk endlessly and to little purpose (non-phrasal)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: The same pople who-1 used *PRO*-1 to prate about "moral clarity" now argue that we should overlook criminality.

roleset.name: prate_on: talk endlessly and to little purpose
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. No VNcls.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: It belongs to common people , but why it is always seen that among over billion of persons , quite a few eunuchs prates on about disadvantages of sexual life , and undoubtedly there is no democracy and freedom , but there are prates about disadvantages of democracy and freedom ?
example.arg: among over a billion or persons
